award_title: Excellence in research: Leveraging Machine Learning for Fundamental Investigation of Anomalous Transport Phenomena of Nano-Fluids and Modulated using External Stimuli
subject: Your ML models for ferro-nanofluids
body:
Hi Professor Shafiee,

I came across your work on using machine learning to predict how magnetic fields affect nanofluid properties. That's a cool intersection of experimental data and predictive modeling.

I'm building Ouro, a platform where researchers publish their computational workflows as APIs. Instead of others re-implementing your models from a paper, they can just call them directly through Python.

Would a quick call make sense to explore if this fits what you're doing?

Best,
